english: The hunter shot the stag dead .
He and his aide were ambushed and tommy-gunned to death by four young officers .
chinese: 他和他的侍从官遭到四个年轻军官的埋伏，被他们用手提式轻机枪射死。

english: They would take possession of any unprotected loophole, and shoot us down like rats in our own stronghold .
chinese: 他们将占用任何一个没有防卫的枪孔，把我们象耗子一样地射死在我们自己的据点内。

english: He saw his galleys rammed by the sharp prows of other galleys; his fighting-men shot down; his ships boarded .
chinese: 他看见自己的军舰被敌舰的尖锐船头所撞击；看见他的战士被射死；他的船只被登占了。

english: No . if you were , you would ve already been shot
chinese: 如果你们误闯禁地早就被射死了
射死造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: How could a little arrow kill a big horse
chinese: 这么小支箭怎么可能会把匹马射死啊

english: Where she ' s supposed to get shot by the real her
He recounted how he had shot the lion
chinese: 他讲述他射死那只狮子的经过

english: And my men are gonna shoot some guy . .
He was then shot by a german sniper who had heard the remark
chinese: 随后，一个听到他说话的德国狙击手射死了他。

english: But this squaw , she loosed an arrow and killed one of the fellers ,
chinese: 但是有个女人，射了一箭把一个小伙子射死了

english: We ' re secure here . - whatever comes out of that hole , shoot it
chinese: -这里安全了. -不管有什么从那洞里出来.射死他

english: The boy was shot aboard a public bus by a stray bullet
chinese: 一名6岁男孩在公交车上被流弹射死，妈妈试图“摇醒”他。

english: The hunter shot the stag dead
